TopicTitle: How was your Fourth of July?

Articles.Content:
Mine was cool. I went to a party, and then I watched an amazing fireworks show!

So, how was yours?

Boring. Family dinner.

There were a few fireworks some distance away. I saw one firework go off.

On the bright side, I saw a documentary about Enron. That was interesting. 

Although, it is now the day after. That's good news.
I work for a fireworks company, so the 4th and the week before were horrendously busy (18-hour work days!)
